{
  "name": "Keto Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry",
  "cuisine": "Chinese",
  "culinary_preference": "keto",
  "time": "15m",
  "main_ingredients": [
    "500g beef (sirloin or ribeye, sliced into thin strips)",
    "300g broccoli (fresh, florets)",
    "3 cloves garlic (minced)",
    "2 tablespoons coconut oil",
    "1 tablespoon low-carb sauce (see below for recipe)",
    "1 small onion (thinly sliced)",
    "1 small bok choy (chopped)",
    "1 teaspoon grated ginger",
    "1 teaspoon soy sauce (make sure sugar-free)",
    "1 teaspoon sesame oil",
    "Salt and pepper to taste"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Heat 1 tablespoon coconut oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add beef and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until browned. Remove from wok and set aside.",
    "In the same wok, add the remaining 1 tablespoon coconut oil. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, until fragrant.",
    "Add the sliced onion and cook for 2-3 minutes, until softened. Add broccoli and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until tender but still crisp.",
    "Add the cooked beef back into the wok, along with low-carb sauce, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Stir to combine.",
    "Add chopped bok choy and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste."
  ],
  "low-carb_sauce": {
    "name": "Low-Carb Stir Fry Sauce",
    "main_ingredients": [
      "2 tablespoons coconut aminos",
      "2 tablespoons coconut oil",
      "2 cloves garlic (minced)",
      "1 tablespoon grated ginger",
      "1 tablespoon soy sauce (sugar-free)",
      "1 teaspoon sesame oil",
      "1 teaspoon rice vinegar",
      "1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (optional)"
    ],
    "steps": [
      "In a small bowl, whisk together all ingredients until smooth.",
      "Adjust seasoning to taste."
    ]
  }
}

{
  "name": "Keto Chinese Stir-Fry",
  "culinary_preference": "keto",
  "time": "20m",
  "main_ingredients": [
    "1 head of cauliflower (1 cup, broken into florets)",
    "2 inches of ginger (2 inches, peeled and grated)",
    "3 cloves of garlic (minced)",
    "1 pound of pork (sliced into thin strips)",
    "2 tablespoons of coconut oil",
    "1 tablespoon of soy sauce (make sure sugar-free)",
    "1 tablespoon of oyster sauce (make sure sugar-free)",
    "1 teaspoon of sesame oil",
    "1 teaspoon of sesame seeds",
    "Salt and pepper to taste",
    "Scallions (chopped, for garnish)",
    "Green onions (chopped, for garnish)"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Heat 1 tablespoon of coconut oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced pork and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the pork from the wok and set aside.",
    "In the same wok, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of coconut oil. Add the grated ginger and minced garlic and stir-fry until fragrant, about 30 seconds.",
    "Add the cauliflower florets to the wok and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, or until slightly tender.",
    "Return the cooked pork to the wok and stir in the soy sauce and oyster sauce. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the pork is coated in the sauce.",
    "Season with salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with chopped scallions and green onions. Serve immediately.",
    "Note: Make sure to use sugar-free soy sauce and oyster sauce to keep the dish keto-friendly."
  ],
  "note": "This recipe is a keto-friendly Chinese stir-fry dish that combines the flavors of ginger, garlic, and pork with the crunch of cauliflower. Enjoy!"
}

{
  "name": "Keto Chinese Fried Cauliflower Rice",
  "cuisine": "Chinese",
  "culinary_preference": "keto",
  "time": "30m",

    "1 tsp cornstarch",
    "1 tsp five-spice powder",

generated_recipes.dpo_recipe:
{
  "name": "Cauliflower Beef Fajita Burrito",
  "cuisine": "Mexican",
  "culinary_preference": "keto",
  "time": "20m",
  "main_ingredients": [
    "1 head of cauliflower (1 cup, grated)",
    "1 lb beef (sirloin or flank steak, sliced)",
    "1/2 cup of avocado oil",
    "2 cloves of garlic, minced",
    "1 tablespoon of grated fresh ginger",
    "1 cup of bok choy, chopped",
    "1 cup of diced bell peppers",
    "1 cup of diced onion",
    "1/2 cup of chopped fresh cilantro",
    "1/4 cup of chopped fresh scallions",
    "1/2 teaspoon of ground cumin",
    "1/2 teaspoon of chili powder",
    "1/4 teaspoon of cayenne pepper",
    "Salt and pepper, to taste"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1/4 cup of avocado oil and swirl to coat the pan.",
    "Add the sliced beef to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired level of doneness. Transfer the beef to a plate and cover with foil to keep warm.",
    "In the same skillet, add the remaining 1/4 cup of avocado oil and swirl to coat the pan. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger and cook for 1 minute, or until fragrant.",
    "Add the chopped onion and bell peppers to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Add the chopped bok choy and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until wilted.",
    "Warm large lettuce leaves or low-carb tortillas in the microwave for 10-15 seconds. Assemble the burritos by spooning the beef and vegetable mixture onto the tortillas, followed by a sprinkle of chopped cilantro and scallions.",
    "Serve immediately and enjoy!"
  ]
}
